metadata.title: CVE-2022-37032 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read in the BGP daemon of FRRouting FRR before 8.4 maylead to a segmentation fault and denial of service. This occurs inbgp_capability_msg_parse in bgpd/bgp_packet.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.1-1ubuntu1.2
frr-pythontools - 8.1-1ubuntu1.2
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.1-1ubuntu1.2
frr-snmp - 8.1-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1-1ubuntu1.2').
